com.spotlight.track
Class MyCallListener

java.lang.Object
  AbstractPhoneListener
      com.spotlight.track.MyCallListener

public class MyCallListener
extends AbstractPhoneListener

MyCallListener monitors and registers call based events.

Constructor Summary
MyCallListener(LocalDataAccess inputAccess)
          The constructor initialises the action store location and registers the callListener for the device.

          Adds action to log when the call has been connected
